name: part_001
file: tmp_【#夜明けのBJライブ】Blue Journey 1st Live「夜明けのうた」【無料チラ見せ】 [WdNKKc_etZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A montage showcasing a compilation of supportive messages, illustrations, and fan art from fans for the Blue Journey 1st Live.
Intro sequence featuring the concert title 'Aoake no Uta' with animated transitions and background music.
Showcase of various merchandise available for order, including penlights, t-shirts, towels, and acrylic stands.
Closing information screen with performance hashtags and social media details.
